---
title: "Grabbing Package Data from CRAN"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
cran <- tools::CRAN_package_db()

# the returned data frame has two columns with the same name???
cran <- cran[,-65]

# make it a tibble
cran <- tbl_df(cran)

```



```{r}
names(cran)
```


```{r}
tables_packages <- readRDS("../data/tables.rds")

tables_packages <- tbl_df(tables_packages)
```


```{r}
cran %>% 
  filter(Package %in% tables_packages$value) %>%
  clean_names() %>% 
```
